name: GCDeviceBattery.State
desc: A state that indicates whether a device’s battery has power and is charging.

items.name: case unknown
items.desc: The state of the device’s battery is unknown.

items.name: case charging
items.desc: The device’s battery has power and is charging, but isn’t fully charged.

items.name: case full
items.desc: The device’s battery has power and is fully charged.
